CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 寻找；寻求；寻求（或追求）…的；谋求；争取；（向人）请求；试图

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重努力和彻底搜寻某人或某地。
指像梳头一样进行搜寻，侧重费力和彻底搜查。
书面用词，使用广。指付出很大努力去寻找某人或某物。
一般指对未知事物或新生事物的探索、观察与研究。
侧重按一定线索追查出结果。
一般指寻找所需的物件，或对罪犯的搜寻，特指追猎。
语义庄重，语气强，使用广。多暗示做出很大努力去寻求某人或物。

word_group.brief_definition: 寻找, 探寻, 找出

bilingual.source: I went to the American consulate to seek help.
bilingual.target: 我去美国领事馆寻求帮助。

bilingual.source: Research also suggests that our desire to seek risks can be connected.
bilingual.target: 研究还表明，我们寻求风险的欲望是有联系的。

bilingual.source: Many people seek the wisdom of a lama.
bilingual.target: 许多人寻求喇嘛的智慧。

bilingual.source: We need to seek advice from experts.
bilingual.target: 我们需要寻求专家的建议。

bilingual.source: They went to seek help from the sorcerer.
bilingual.target: 他们去找妖人寻求帮助。

bilingual.source: They seek help to complete the project.
bilingual.target: 他们寻求帮助以完成项目。

bilingual.source: I always seek advice from my parents.
bilingual.target: 我总是向我的父母寻求忠告。

bilingual.source: She decided to repent and seek forgiveness.
bilingual.target: 她决定忏悔并寻求原谅。

bilingual.source: He decided to seek new job opportunities.
bilingual.target: 他决定寻求新的工作机会。

list.abstract: Seek（英 [siːk]，美 [siːk]），英语单词，动词，意思为寻找；寻求；追求。短语搭配有seek out（寻找）。例句为“They seek new sources of readership.（他们寻找新的读者来源。）” Seek相关及物动词类近义词有explore、try to find，相关不及物动词类近义词有explore、cast about for。

yingyinNormal.en: All seek our protection yet not trust us enough to tell us anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都来寻求我们的庇护，却不以诚相待。

yingyinNormal.en: You just took advantage of the situation. Matthews took advantage. I didn't seek the nomination.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不过是渔翁得利。是Matthews得利，我没有寻求提名。

yingyinNormal.en: The love of family, the joy of good friends, the bonds of community, the freedom we cherish as Americans, the peace and justice we seek in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 家人的爱，和好朋友在一起的快乐，社区的团结，我们珍视作为美国人的自由，我们在世界上寻求的和平和公正。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what you seek to find, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不就是在寻找事实真相吗

yingyinNormal.en: I know ladies don't seek to seem too eager...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我了解小姐们都会矜持推诿一下……

yingyinNormal.en: Father, may we continue with the lesson? I seek knowledge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸 我们可以继续上课吗？我渴望知识。

yingyinNormal.en: Hide and seek.
yingyinNormal.zh: 捉迷藏。

yingyinNormal.en: A great man doesn't seek to lead. He is called to it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伟大之人不是主动去成为领导者的。他是受到召唤而有所响应。

yingyinNormal.en: What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你所寻找的就在你面前。你所害怕的也在那里。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we don't seek the spotlight. I'm not suggesting you should.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不想太受瞩目。我不是说你们非要如此。

yingyinNormal.en: The late Emperor was not ashamed to visit my cottage and seek my advice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先帝不以臣卑鄙，猥自枉屈，三顾臣于草庐之中，咨臣以当世之事，

yingyinNormal.en: We are playing hide and seek. But I cannot find anyone. Should I find them for you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正在玩捉迷藏。可是我一个人也没找到。你需要我帮你一起找吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We are playing hide and seek. But I cannot find anyone. Should I find them for you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正在玩捉迷藏。可是我一个人也没找到。你需要我帮你一起找吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My innate desire to seek out other life was not so that I could walk among that life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我与生俱来的渴望去寻找其他生命并不是为了让我成为那样的人。

yingyinNormal.en: You have found a way in. You seek that which would bestow upon you the right to rule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你找到了进山的方法，你在找能赋予你王权的宝物。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her friends are playing at Rebecca Rabbit's house. Let's play hide and seek.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和朋友们在小兔瑞贝卡的家里玩。我们一起来玩捉迷藏吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her friends are playing at Rebecca Rabbit's house. Let's play hide and seek.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和朋友们在小兔瑞贝卡的家里玩。我们一起来玩捉迷藏吧。

yingyinNormal.en: If these were theater performers in sort of athletes, would you seek special treatment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们俩是舞台剧演员，你也会要求特殊待遇吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Millions pour to the capital from all over the country every year to seek their fortune.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数百万的人从全国各地涌入首都北京，年年来寻找他们的财富。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? Someone hides and we all try to find them. That sounds like "Hide and seek".
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么游戏，一个人躲起来，我们一起去找他。这个听起来就好像是捉迷藏。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 请求(帮助); 征求(意见)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to try to obtain or achieve sth

examination_example.sentence: It was the purpose and responsibility of great minds to go forth and <highlight>seek</highlight> out the truth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伟大人物的目的和责任就是去探索真理。

examination_example.sentence: Many young people assume a great deal of personal responsibility for educating themselves and actively <highlight>seeking</highlight> out opposing viewpoints.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多年轻人承担了很大的个人责任来教育自己，并积极寻求相反的观点。

examination_example.sentence: Today many people find it difficult to trust their own opinion and <highlight>seek</highlight> balance by gaining objectivity from external sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，许多人发现很难相信自己的观点，并通过从外部获得客观性来寻求平衡。

sense_info_list.zh: 请求(帮助); 征求(意见)

examination_example.sentence: And stay alert to serious symptoms, such as chest pain or pressure, and <highlight>seek</highlight> medical attention immediately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并对严重症状保持警惕，如胸痛或胸闷。

examination_example.sentence: It is advisable to <highlight>seek</highlight> expert advice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 征求专家意见是明智的。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists are increasingly <highlight>seeking</highlight> out visual artists to help them communicate their work to new audiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们越来越多地寻找视觉艺术家来帮助他们向新观众传达他们的作品。

examination_example.sentence: People would be driven by beautiful wild creatures fascination to travel to wild areas to <highlight>seek</highlight> out disturb and even hunt them down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们会被美丽的野生动物的魅力所驱使，去野外寻找干扰，甚至猎杀它们。

word_usage.usage:
作动词表示“寻找”
seek语气较强，使用广泛，指尽很大努力去寻找合适的人或某种东西，此类东西多为抽象事物。
search指搜查某一具体的人、地方、事物以找到某物或某人，含非常仔细之意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探求者；搜索者；搜查人

word_family.mean: v. 寻找；寻求；追求；找到；找出；请求；去；前往

sense_info_list.en: make an effort or attempt; attempt or desire to obtain or achieve something

examination_example.sentence: We are always <highlight>seeking</highlight> ways to reduce and revalue our waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直在寻找减少和重新评估废弃物的方法。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Seek</highlight> ways to sustain their motivation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想办法维持他们的动力。

examination_example.sentence: They are constantly <highlight>seeking</highlight> approval from their audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不断地寻求观众的认可。

examination_example.sentence: When both sides try to <highlight>seek</highlight> common ground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当双方试图寻求共同点时。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Seeking</highlight> advice from management and legal experts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向管理和法律专家寻求建议。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探求者；搜索者；搜查人

word_family.mean: v. 寻找；寻求；追求；找到；找出；请求；去；前往

examination_example.sentence: Most animals <highlight>seek</highlight> shade when temperatures in the Sahara Desert soar to 120 degrees Fahrenheit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当撒哈拉沙漠的温度飙升至120华氏度时，大多数动物都会寻找阴凉处。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>seek</highlight> advice from technology companies to achieve teaching goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们向科技公司寻求建议，以实现教学目标。

examination_example.sentence: The more money a project <highlight>sought</highlight>, the lower the chance it reached its goal, the researchers found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，一个项目寻求的资金越多，它达到目标的几率就越低。

sense_info_list.en: make an effort or attempt; attempt or desire to obtain or achieve something

exam_freq_info.chinese: 寻求; 谋求; 争取

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探求者；搜索者；搜查人

word_family.mean: v. 寻找；寻求；追求；找到；找出；请求；去；前往

sense_info_list.zh: 寻求; 谋求; 争取

examination_example.sentence: Henry David Thoreau was happy to withdraw from social life, <highlight>seeking</highlight> a harmonious relationship with nature in the quietness of his life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亨利·大卫·梭罗乐于退出社会生活，在平静的生活中寻求与自然的和谐关系。

examination_example.sentence: The solution, of course, was to plant trees so the animals could <highlight>seek</highlight> shelter during the daytime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，解决的办法是种树，这样动物就可以在白天寻找庇护所。

examination_example.sentence: One group was asked to <highlight>seek</highlight> out an interaction (互动) with its waiter; the other, to speak only when necessary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组被要求争取和它的服务员互动；另一组则被要求只在必要的时候说话。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Seeking</highlight> other like-minded souls, however, Paulo started looking in a somewhat unlikely place: online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，为了寻找其他志同道合的人，保罗开始在一个有点不太可能的地方寻找：网上。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>seek</highlight> people who are patient and caring, and who have  experience and interest in working with older adults.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们寻找有耐心、有爱心、有经验并有兴趣与老年人一起工作的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: An interesting thing is that our brain make <highlight>seeking</highlight> information much like eating — another pleasant activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有趣的是，我们的大脑让寻找信息很像吃东西——另一种愉快的活动。
